message.body: So I'd love to see you soon! This month is a shit show for both of us I have no doubt. Maybe january I come down for a night or two? I'll give you a call this weekend and we should figure out something. So close and yet so far away! Xoxo p.s. I'm listening to when the pawn for the first time in a long time. Lnz on Ma mind
Actually, Ryan leaves town the 20th. I'll be hangin solo in the brooklyn palace
I knows it. It's been 6 months! Are you going to va for Xmas?
I think so. Not sure yet. Work is closed but not sure if I can get off the 23rd
